summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6106 for the improvement of Lake Washington Boulevard North at East Howell Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by installing fire hydrants and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 84276, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
